channel.title: Client Enforcing
channel.description:
Well, I suppose this is for both client and server; not just a server. But anywho, I'm trying to make the client connecting get checked whether or not it is the right client. I was searching around and figured out something called clientEnforce, but sadly I have no idea how to use it. Basicly here is what I need broken down:
Client connects. Server checks if the client is the right type. If the client isn't, it disconnects. If it is the right type, it doesn't do anything.
Now, what would I put in the client and/or server to make it do such a thing?

This is for both the server and the client. I don’t want to post in two different forums.

item.title: Client Enforcing
item.dc:creator: @Brandonrs45 Brandonrs45
item.description:
@Brandonrs45 wrote:

Well, I suppose this is for both client and server; not just a server. But anywho, I’m trying to make the client connecting get checked whether or not it is the right client. I was searching around and figured out something called clientEnforce, but sadly I have no idea how to use it. Basicly here is what I need broken down:

Client connects.
Server checks if the client is the right type.
If the client isn’t, it disconnects. If it is the right type, it doesn’t do anything.

Now, what would I put in the client and/or server to make it do such a thing?
